Claim Analytics Hub

Note: This is a static build of the application. Some features that require a server might not work correctly.

Since you've been having trouble accessing the development server, we've created a static build of the application that you can open directly in your browser.

Option 1: Open the built application

Click the button below to open the application:

Launch Application

Option 2: Use a simple HTTP server

If the application doesn't load correctly using Option 1, you can serve the files using a simple HTTP server.

Python HTTP Server

Open Terminal and run:

cd /Users/rashid/HWG\ FILES\ 2.0/claim-analytics-hub/dist
python3 -m http.server 8000

Then visit http://localhost:8000 in your browser.

Node HTTP Server

If you have Node.js installed, you can use:

cd /Users/rashid/HWG\ FILES\ 2.0/claim-analytics-hub/dist
npx serve

This will provide a URL you can click to open the application.

Troubleshooting

  • If you see a blank page, check your browser's developer console for errors (F12 or right-click â†’ Inspect)
  • Try a different browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
  • Make sure all necessary files are in the dist directory
